mapper.insert: insert into ENTRY_APPLICATION( MEMBER_INDEX, BOARD_ID, ENTRY_APPLICATION_CONTENT, ENTRY_APPLICATION_DATE) VALUES (#{memberIndex}, #{boardId}, #{entryApplicationContent}, (current_date) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM entry_application ea JOIN board b ON b.BOARD_ID = ea.BOARD_ID JOIN `member` m ON b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX WHERE b.MEMBER_INDEX = #{memberIndex} AND ea.ENTRY_STATUS IN (0, 1) ORDER BY ea.ENTRY_APPLICATION_DATE ASC;
